author: Red Means Recording
description:
This is the Chordcat, a chord-based groovebox. I thought it was a neat idea so I bought one and made a video about it. As of now the only place you can get one is here, I think: https://alphatheta.com/en/product/production/chordcat/gray/

Support the channel on Patreon: http://bit.ly/rmrpatreon
Take a lesson with me: https://rmr.media/education

Find my music here: 
https://rmr.media/findme

Connect:
Bluesky: https://bit.ly/3ZGYhom
Website: http://bit.ly/rmrmedia

00:00 intro
01:48 walkthrough
15:25 with a DAW
18:15 with hardware
title: I Bought a Weird Groovebox!
